fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Defensive: If you end the phase with no defenses, draw a guaranteed defense card at the end of the phase.
- Reflexes: If you get attacked this phase, draw an extra card at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Train: Upgrade a card in your hand. [1 use, UOR2]
- Shields: Gain a Guard! [4 uses, 2 CD]
- Advance: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, Attack! them. If they do win with you, Guard! an available attack on them. Activates end of phase, influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD]
